title: David Mawdsley
text: Welcome to my homepage. You can read more about me, or read my blog posts

title: About me
text:
I am a Senior Research Software Engineer at the University of Manchester. When I’m not working I enjoy bouldering, swimming, cycling and hiking. I live in Bristol.
You can see my full career history on Linkedin, but briefly:

title: About me
text:
Experience
Senior Research Software Engineer | University of Manchester | June 2021 - present
Technical Director | Vuzo Ltd | April 2019 - May 2021
Interim Infrastructure Director | DataHE | Febuary 2019 - March 2019
Research Software Engineer | University of Manchester | November 2016 - January 2019
Research Assistant -> Senior Research Associate | University of Bristol | September 2013 - January 2015
Analyst -> Senior Analyst | Higher Education Funding Council for England | July 2007 to September 2013

title: About me
text:
Education
